page.title: 08Leicester's Concrete Jungle
page.content: {Leicester,}as a major Central City, is situated astride the{River Soar,}its many separate residential suburbs on both banks. The{Central Business {District}dominates the skyline, with its frequent high rise office blocks and overall concrete appearance. It provides the area with varying{ {commercial, industrial}and{business {services.}However, the area is not totally an urban sprawl, there are{8 {public parks,}Victoria, Braunstone, Abbey and Western parks being the main ones. These provide an essential service to the inhabitants of the suburbs and add a{splash of green}to the city. The natural environment was at one time, totally covered by{ {Deciduous Forest,}unlike today's concrete jungle.
